scripts.create-feature:
ng generate library $npm_config_name --prefix=pli && mv projects/$npm_config_name src/app/features/ && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const base='src/app/features/'+process.env.npm_config_name;fs.renameSync(base+'/src/public-api.ts',base+'/src/index.ts');const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(base+'/package.json'));pkg.name='@pli-feature/'+process.env.npm_config_name;fs.writeFileSync(base+'/package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2)+'
');const ng=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(base+'/ng-package.json'));ng.lib.entryFile='src/index.ts';fs.writeFileSync(base+'/ng-package.json',JSON.stringify(ng,null,2)+'
');console.log('âœ… Created @pli-feature/'+process.env.npm_config_name+' with index.ts')"
